• An error occurred.
Sorry for the inconvenience. Please reply to this email describing the issue, or call 877-762-8242, We’ll get on it straight away.
• I wasn’t sure about using Plaid to link my bank details; is it secure?
Yes. Plaid is a third-party service that Matbia and plenty of other apps and websites use to securely link financial accounts. Many major banks and credit unions partner with Plaid, and personal information won't be shared with any outside entities.
• I understand, but I’d still rather link my bank details manually; can I do that?
Sure; here’s how it’s done:
1. Go to settings , and select ‘ Bank Accounts.’
2. Click on ‘Link New Account'.
3. Fill out the options below ‘Connect Your Bank.’
Next to ‘I have a username…,’ choose ‘No.’ Then click ‘Connect.’
4. You’ll be directed to select your bank.
Scroll down, and select, ‘Link with account numbers.
’ You can then manually enter your bank details.
• It’s something else.
